**About TuneVPS**

TuneVPS was started in 2013 by three web hosting professionals with over 15 years of combined experience as system administrators.  While working for other hosting companies we saw how customer service was an afterthought.  This is why we started TuneVPS. We are here to serve customer content and the needs of our customers.
We guarantee 99.9% service uptime, and 24x7 technical support with a maximum of three hours to resolve all technical support issues.
Give our services a try!  All new customers have 30 days to test TuneVPS services, and are covered by a Money Back guarantee.

**FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS**

**• What virtualization technology do you use?**
- We use KVM and OpenVZ. Select the virtualization you prefer and from package specifications that meet your needs.  We are always here to help you find the right package.

**•Do you provide support for TUN/TAP and PPP?**
- Yes, we  support TUN/TAP and PPP natively.  Contact us if you have any problems.

**• What is the port speed of my VPS?**
- Every VPS is on a server connected via gigabit port.

**• Can I upgrade or downgrade my VPS at any time?**
- Yes, you can do this yourself via our billing portal.  All plan changes happen near-time and automatically.

**• I've paid for my VPS, when will it be set up?**
- We use automated provisioning. Your VPS is provisioned immediately after payment. If you experience a delay you can contact our support team to resolve any issue.

**• How much do you charge for additional IPv4 addresses?**
- Additional IPv4 address are $2 per IP per month.

**• Do you support custom ISOs?**
- We support custom ISOs on our KVM services.

**• What payment methods do you accept?**
- We use PayPal for payments and Paypal accepts all major credit and debit cards.
